Queries.query: CREATE TABLE `products` ( `pid` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `price` double DEFAULT NULL, `brand` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `category` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `qty` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pid`), KEY `brand_idx` (`brand`), KEY `cate_fkey_idx` (`category`), CONSTRAINT `brand_fkey` FOREIGN KEY (`brand`) REFERENCES `brands` (`bid`), CONSTRAINT `cate_fkey` FOREIGN KEY (`category`) REFERENCES `categories` (`cid`) );
SELECT p.pid , p.name , p.price , b.name as bname , c.name as cname ,p.qty FROM products as p , brands as b , categories as c WHERE p.brand = b.bid and p.category = c.cid
update products as p set p.pid = ?, p.name = ?, p.price = ?, p.brand = ?,p.category = ? ,p.qty = ? where p.pid = ?
update brands as b set b.bid = ?, b.name = ?, b.status = ? where b.bid = ?
update category as c set c.cid = ?, c.name = ?, c.status = ? where c.cid = ?
